string.value: After you hunted five Red Snails, Mai says its time for even more powerful monsters. She wants you to hunt #r3 Slimes#k and bring back #b1 Squishy Liquid#k. \n\nSlime #r#a10431##k #i4000004# #t4000004# #b#c4000004# #k/1
After succesfully hunting Slimes, you obtained the Squishy Liquid and reported to Mai.
빨간 달팽이를 퇴치하고 돌아왔군. 많이 다치지는 않았겠지? 이번에 잡아야 할 몬스터는 더 강한 녀석이라고. 이번에 사냥할 몬스터는 슬라임 3마리야. 슬라임을 사냥하고 녀석에게서 물컹물컹한 액체 1개를 가져오면 돼.
슬라임은 스텀프나 달팽이에 비해 훨씬 빠른데다가 점프를 하기까지 하니까, 조심해서 사냥해. 모아놓은 달팽이 껍질이 있다면 그걸 사용해서 사냥해 보는 것도 좋아. 그럼 행운을 빌게.
무섭다면 잠깐 쉬면서 마음의 각오를 다지는 것도 괜찮아.

I see that you have eliminated the Red Snails. Hope you didn't get too roughed up. Your next mission involves an even more powerful monster. This time, you'll be slaying #r3 Slimes#k. Bring me back #b1 Squishy Liquid#k, too! That's all.
Slimes are worlds faster than Stumps and Snails. They also jump around, so you really need to be careful. I suggest you use the skill #bThree Snails#k to attack from a distance. Good luck!
If you're worried about safety, take some time to calm down and prepare yourself.
It doesn't look like you've defeated #r3 Slimes#k and brought back #b1 Squishy Liquid#k. I suggest you use some "Use" items while hunting. They'll definitely help.
It doesn't look like you've defeated #r3 Slimes#k and brought back #b1 Squishy Liquid#k. I suggest you use some "Use" items while hunting. They'll definitely help.
